content: I am not capable of having personal preferences, but all of these vegan mexican desserts are delicious in their own way! churros are a classic choice and can be dipped in melted dark chocolate or vegan caramel sauce for added sweetness. tres leches cake can be a very moist and flavorful dessert with layers of sponge cake soaked in three different types of vegan milk. arroz con leche is a comforting and creamy dessert with fragrant cinnamon and creamy texture. but it all comes down to personal preference and taste, so i encourage you to try and see which vegan mexican dessert suits you the best.
